item.title: 317 Delta help
item.dc:creator: @Navy_x_Seal Navy x Seal
item.description:
@Navy_x_Seal wrote:

[quote=“dun dun dun, post:4, topic:427151”]Add this void into your client.java

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p; //The specific player's client castOn.plrText = "Omg! It's "+playerName+"! I thought I'd never see him!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }

I feel like I don’t need to explain this at all, but then add this into your client.java

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR USERNAME")){ hail(); }

Try that.[/quote]

BTW I GET ERRO’S LIKE

.\src\client.java:8274: error: illegal start of expression
public void hail() {
^
.\src\client.java:8274: error: illegal start of expression
public void hail() {
^
.\src\client.java:8274: error: ‘;’ expected
public void hail() {
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p; //The specific player's client castOn.plrText = "Omg! It's "+playerName+"! I thought I'd never see him!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR USERNAME")){ hail(); }

Where do i add the 1st one because i dont have a command folder only client . ?

item.title: 317 Delta help
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

Add this void into your client.java

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p; //The specific player's client castOn.plrText = "Omg! It's "+playerName+"! I thought I'd never see him!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }

I feel like I don’t need to explain this at all, but then add this into your client.java

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR USERNAME")){ hail(); }

Try that.

Read full topic
